name: alcohol-shortage
headline: Alcohol Shortage Causes Riots
article: Sobriety rates have never been higher, as a recent hops shortage has dried up our taverns. "There's too much blood in our alcohol stream!" groans local adventurers who can't fight due to the collective hangovers.

outcomes.customDescription: It's not as good as beer, but it'll do.

choices.name: Order a Shipment from Far Off

name: protagonist
headline: "But I'm The Protagonist"
article: Local adventurer has come to the shocking realisation that this world might not actually be entirely in service of their grand heroes journey. "I thought I was the main character! And now there's all these people telling me they have their own lives when I'm not here? Honestly I appreciate the immersion factor, but this is unacceptable!"

name: loot-drop
article: Local wildlife has started dropping swords

name: vikings
article: Vikings come to town, host a massive (and deadly) party

name: snakes
headline: The Plane of Snakes
article: A tear in reality has opened up, with snakes flooding out
Hero keeps crit failing in increasingly absurd ways
Someone accidentally casts a spell by stringing random words together
